triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: Paper analyzes and proposes methods for aligning large language models used in conversational agents with human values.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: Conversational agents (chatbots) are the primary system subject of study in this paper for alignment with human values.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is the foundational computational approach enabling conversational agents to process and generate natural language.

triples.name: AI alignment
triples.relevance: AI alignment is the core concept the paper addresses, specifically applied to conversational agents and human values.

triples.name: Pragmatics
triples.relevance: Paper proposes philosophical analysis building on pragmatics to formulate ideal norms of conversation for human-agent interaction.
